[[inst_hl_sdp_u]]
==== HL.SDP.U

*Syntax:* hl.sdp.u SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}>]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sdp_u.svg[HL.SDP.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
